title: PEOBLEM
body:
Hello.I can't sing in in game.
My username and password is okey,but can't sing.
Please help,what to do ?

replies.body: Im in the same boat wont go past loading, and has been doing it all night.. no messages nothing
I'd like to help!  Are you getting any error messages when trying to sign in, and what does it say?  Are you also connected to the correct region (EUNE) on the login screen?
